mapper.select: SELECT a.behavior_id as id, c.behavior_response as response FROM t_sys_user_behavior a, t_sys_user_behavior_params b, t_sys_user_behavior_response c WHERE a.behavior_id = b.behavior_id AND b.request_id = c.request_id AND a.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND a.behavior_target_url LIKE concat('%', #{behaviorTargetUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND a.behavior_time > #{lowerLimitTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}
